description: These trees are so much fun. I get started on them and I have a hard time stopping. I thought today we would do a happy little picture. If you've been in Alaska less than a year you're a Cheechako. Everyone needs a friend. Friends are the most valuable things in the world. With practice comes confidence. You need the dark in order to show the light.
